name: Dark Maze (itch) (Brain Digger)
description:
You're a lamp looking for light in the dark. Collect matches and avoid strong winds to keep your flame burning while searching for the way through this Dark Maze.

This game was made as an exercise in level design for a course in game design in Bezalel Academy of Art and Design in Jerusalem.

Play with arrow keys on the keyboard.

Credits:

  • Shahar Korren - Design,  Development and Sound
  • Joe Benharrosh - Design and Graphics
  • Avital Kronfeld - Design
